item.title: Winston Ability Overview | Overwatch

meta.summary:
b"Imagination is the essence of discovery: http://www.playoverwatch.com/heroes/winston

A super-intelligent, genetically engineered gorilla, Winston is a brilliant scientist and champion for humanity's potential. After spending several years working as a scientist for Overwatch, Winston has gone into seclusion since its fall, cut off from the world he believes in, longing for the days of heroism to return. 

Winston wields impressive inventions on the battlefieldincluding a short-ranged Tesla cannon, jump pack, and portable shield projector. But his most powerful weapon can only be unleashed by embracing his animal nature. 

Sign Up for Beta: http://bit.ly/JoinOverwatch 
Like Us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/playoverwatch 
Follow Us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/playoverwatch"

item.title: How GRANDMASTER Players DESTROY With WINSTON | XQC - Overwatch Season 7 Competitive Guide

meta.summary:
b'----------------------------------------------------------------
This video was sponsored by Guilded. Find out more about the best Overwatch LFG around, plus a chance at a $50 Blizzard Card giveaway here: https://www.guilded.gg/JoeKingYT
----------------------------------------------------------------


Today we are back again trying a top 500 tip Winston video because I think its fun and people just love Winston it seems. Today we are talking about how the grandmaster Winston player can carry his competitive games in season 7 overwatch competitive ranked mode. Going over some Winston season 7 tips and guide or whatever you want to call it. thanks! 




More Videos! : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df



Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vuQYDAersGE
Thumbnail:https://orig00.deviantart.net/87bf/f/2016/128/d/d/winston___overwatch__fanart__by_asteltainn-da1r7az.jpg
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



======================================================================

TIPS I WROTE DOWN FROM THE VIDEO:
-You need to play winston in a dive comp, and if you dive well you can kill a slow push mercy comp
-playing winston is more about knowing where to be and when to be there over mechanics
-with zarya on your team push up fruther than you wuld think
-dont be afraid to get into the backline, but make sure you have an escape and dont waste jump
-focus the mercy, but if she escapes dont waste jump chasing unless you up many people
-Use your buble after you have taken a bit of damage so your healers get some ult charge
-Callout when the mercy goes in too far, and tell people you are going ham
-to finish tracer and genji make sure to melee,
-Dont be afraid to use your ult to stall or just to get in to finish a low hp support
-make sure to push up as much as possible to keep them staggered

-if you think you may get traped by anything, just start walking backwards
-Your shield can hep waste a lot of abilities, like the meis iceicle
-wait around walls to get behind the enmy team, if you have ult there isnt much to fear
-hit people in ult towards walls to combo or towards the other rim
-you can never beat roadhog in 1v1, but you can stall a lot of time wlaking through your shiled
-Use your jump to pick up healthpacks if you are about to die
-Callout to go in the second you get a pick
-Use to push reaper away from your team, or to tank mcree ult shots
-Reapers again counters you, but if you push up with shild and make him overextend you can win

======================================================================





What is overwatch?: Well overwatch is Blizzards new take on the fps genre. In this game you choose a hero or "Class" to take on enemies, push payloads, and take control points. The point of the game is to beat the other team over and it is indeed a whole bunch of fun to play. The game includes 27 heroes so far and Is a blast to play. In this video I mostly go over playing it in a commentary type of manner, and these types of videos will usually be overwatch live commentaries or overwatch group commentaries. As well expect a few guides of this game in the future and some box openings as well. Anyways, hope you enjoy blizzards new hit!'

Who is JoeKing aka me. Im a overwatch youtuber that likes to talk about character updates, how to get better, and the competitive community. Trying to help you get better at overwatch and entertain at the same time hopefully. How GRANDMASTER Players DESTORY with Winston - Overwatch Top 500 PRO Tricks Overwatch - 20 TricksWinston Grandmasters ABUSE That You Don't! Some tips and tricks to master Winston! Overwatch - 7 OP Tips and Tricks Grandmaster Players use every game! item.title: XQC - GRANDMASTER WINSTON GAMEPLAY TIPS | How To Improve As Winston Guide - Overwatch Season 7

meta.summary:
b"----------------------------------------------------------------
CHECK THE SERVICE OUT HERE: 
https://playvig.com/

And if you have questions or concerns, check this out.
https://support.playvig.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
----------------------------------------------------------------


Today we are back again trying a top 500 tip Winston video because I think its fun and people just love Winston it seems. Today we are talking about how the grandmaster Winston player can carry his competitive games in season 7 overwatch competitive ranked mode guide for overwatch season 7 placement matches and overwatch season 7 changes. Going over some Winston season 7 tips and guide or whatever you want to call it. I hope that these tips can help to have you guys learn how to improve as Winston and hope this works as a mini Winston guide tip trick thing for all that want to improve as her. Anyways, thanks! 




More Videos! : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLefC4eOMnbRF5Xm7uCjfU73bh0ybup9Df



Gameplay: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zD7NZBDatDA
Thumbnail: https://i.pinimg.com/736x/a2/72/e7/a272e7385043dcc59106d599bbe6e104--overwatch-winston-pc-online.jpg
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



======================================================================

TIPS I WROTE DOWN FROM THE VIDEO:
-winston isnt a must pick anymore, but dive comps still beat most other comps if played correctly
-solo tank winston works ok on KOTH Maps, so if you cant get a second tank its ok
-he doesnt instantly dive in on the first fight, plays next to his team and peels
-cant face tank reaper so he backs up, this allows his dps to deal with reaper and he reingages
-you dont need to kill the reaper, just take all of his attention
-he doesnt really jump in at the start of fights, usually just shield and tanks around corners, then reingages
-doesnt chase people, just hits the closest person and lets his supports stay safe around him
-jumping in the backline while winning a fight can be good, but jumping in at the beginng is unsafe
-if the enemy team isnt deathballed at any time, call out to your team to go in with ults and DIVEE

-jumps to high ground to force others off of it, not for his dmaage
-every time his team loses a fight he tells them to save ults and regroup. Simple but effective
-he shoots whoever is nearest, unless he sees a mercy by herself. Then take the chance
-Dont ever dive in 1v6. Wait until they are split 
-on this much more open map he focuses on diving backline than protecting his own, hard to protect here
-try to land on your enemy and melee then zap. Gives winston some burst
-dont ult whenever you are on low hp, if a fight is lost just save it

-get ahead of your team with shift to get corners first
-enemies have a lucio and xqc doesnt, he needs to play a lot slower
-hide inside your shield vs dps until you get help, if you dont get help just JUMP AWAY DONT FIGHT
-whenever he changes target he melees them to get that small burst
-use the health packs with your jump to relieve pressure on support healing
-to beat a winston 1v1 you need to melee all the time
-when genji ults, just try to kill him or just kill his backline. People ignore the backline when engaging




======================================================================



how to get better, and the competitive community. Trying to help you get better at overwatch and entertain at the same time hopefully. item.title: Jayne Reviews: Platinum Main Tank

meta.summary:
b"Good day to you all. We're back to review more Platinum Main Tank play. Also have you heard of the contest we are running? Take a peek at the full rules here:

https://www.reddit.com/r/Competitiveoverwatch/comments/8mqsdd/amateur_overwatch_coaching_and_analysis_contest/

Want to have your own Gameplay Reviewed?

Twitch subscribers can submit a 720p30fps recording of their gameplay, with good audio, and no background music on Discord. Submissions from YouTube and Twitch are both accepted.

Which are VODs are accepted is based on video quality, scheduled guests, as well as the uniqueness of the recording. Footage from scrims, PUGs, and tournaments are welcome - and Console, too!

Socials:
